content: Blue light from screens suppresses melatonin for up to 2x longer than green light, shifting circadian rhythms by 3 hours.

content: Viewing sunlight within 30 minutes of waking advances the circadian clock, making it easier to fall asleep 15 hours later.

content: Weighted blankets reduce insomnia severity index scores by 50% via deep pressure stimulation.

source: University of Pennsylvania School of Medicine

content: GABA supplementation increases alpha waves and reduces beta waves in stressed subjects within 1 hour.
